mapper.insert: insert into groups(group_no, leader_name, project_id) values(#{group_no}, #{leader_name}, #{project_id})
mapper.select: SELECT id, group_no, link1, link2, link3, leader_name, project_id FROM GROUPS WHERE id = #{id}
SELECT id, group_no, link1, link2, link3, leader_name, project_id FROM GROUPS WHERE id = (SELECT MAX(group_id) FROM GROUP_MEMBER WHERE member_name = #{username})
SELECT id, group_no, link1, link2, link3, leader_name, project_id FROM GROUPS WHERE id in (SELECT group_id FROM GROUP_MEMBER WHERE member_name = #{username})
SELECT id, group_no, link1, link2, link3, leader_name, project_id FROM groups g LEFT JOIN group_member gm ON gm.group_id = g.id WHERE project_id = #{project_id} AND member_name = #{username}
